meanings.definition: One who spends money or resources freely.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a generous spender when it comes to buying gifts for others.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy businessman is known in town as a big spender at charity events.
meanings.sent3: The spender in our group always treats us to delicious meals without hesitation.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a lavish spender precedes her wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The extravagant spender never hesitates to splurge on luxury items.

meanings.definition: A person who spends a specified amount of time in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: As a dedicated spender of time on his hobbies, he has become quite skilled.
meanings.sent2: The diligent spender of hours on studying always achieves top grades.
meanings.sent3: The time spender on social media lost track of hours scrolling through posts.
meanings.sent4: She is a focused spender of time on her passion for painting, creating beautiful artworks.
meanings.sent5: The careful spender of time on exercise routines has seen great improvements in fitness.
